summary: As he adjusts to being a husband and father, Ariel Perelman meditates on the ways in which he is similar -- and so very different -- from his own dad.
cast: Daniel Hendler|Arturo Goetz|Eloy Burman|Julieta Díaz|Adriana Aizemberg|Jean Pierre Reguerraz|Dmitry Rodnoy|Luis Albornoz|Darío Lagos|Damián Dreizik|Gerardo del Águila|Eduardo Santoro|Ismael Troitiño|Pablo Razuk|Marcos Montes|Daniel Burman|Eduardo Peralta|María Echaide|Leticia Gaspari|María José Bordón|Juan José Flores Quispe|Silvia Geijo|Gustavo Pastorini|María Pastur|Martín Tonelli|Gabriel Yeannoteguy
title: Derecho de familia
